renderpass.code:
void mainImage(out vec4 o, vec2 u) {
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,          O = R-R,
         U = 4.* u / R.y - vec2(6,2), V = U.yy - iTime;
    U.y > 0. ? o += max(0.,1.-abs(length( vec2( U.x+.8+.2*sin(ceil(3.*V.y)),
                                                fract(V)-.5) ) -.05
                                 ) *R.y/4.)      : o;
     U.y*U.y < 1.
     ?  U.y *= sign( (U.x + 3.58 ) * U.y ),
        O += length(++U) - atan(U.y,U.x),
        O *= R.y/8., o += max( 1. - O*O, 0. ).x  : o;}    /*






// --- 151 chars   just the fish

#define mainImage(O,u)                                    \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,                              \
         U = 4.* u / R.y - vec2(6,2);                     \
    U.y*U.y < 1.                                          \
     ?  U.y *= sign( (U.x + 3.58 ) * U.y ),               \
        O += length(++U) - atan(U.y,U.x),                 \
        O *= R.y/8., O = 1.-O*O     : O                  /*






// --- 147 chars   but line artifact at some resolutions

#define mainImage(O,u)                                    \
    vec2 U = 4.* u / iResolution.y - vec2(6,2);           \
    U.y*U.y < 1.                                          \
     ?  U.y *= sign( (U.x + 3.58 ) * U.y ),               \
        O += length(++U) - atan(U.y,U.x),                 \
        O /= fwidth(O), O = 1.-O*O     : O


/**/
renderpass.name: Image
